{"id":944721226,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1683260130,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2550 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/944721226/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost of a Path With Special Roads","memory":"24.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def minimumCost(self, start: List[int], target: List[int], specialRoads: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        (xs, ys), (xt, yt) = start, target\n        adj = defaultdict(lambda: defaultdict(lambda: +inf))\n        nodes = set(map(tuple, (start, target)))\n        for x1, y1, x2, y2, w in specialRoads:\n            adj[(x1, y1)][(x2, y2)] = min(adj[(x1, y1)][(x2, y2)], w)\n            nodes.add((x1, y1))\n            nodes.add((x2, y2))\n        \n        dist = defaultdict(lambda: +inf)\n        dist[(xs, ys)] = 0\n        pq = [(0, (xs, ys))]\n        while pq:\n            dist_u, u = heappop(pq)\n            if u == target:\n                break\n            for v in nodes:\n                w = min(adj[u][v], self.getCost(u, v))\n                if dist_u + w < dist[v]:\n                    dist[v] = dist_u + w\n                    heappush(pq, (dist[v], v))\n        return dist[(xt, yt)]\n        \n    def getCost(self, a, b):\n        return abs(a[0] - b[0]) + abs(a[1] - b[1])","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-of-a-path-with-special-roads","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
